titles.title: A bill for the relief of Richard Kanehl of Mobile, Alabama.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 5/18/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual for damages incurred when a specified corporation incurred involuntary bankruptcy resulting from the termination of three related contracts with the Federal Government.
